title: kalai varam taruvAi
sahitya:
kalai varam taruvAi Om shakti kamala jyOtiyE tAyE vimala sarasvatiyE


anupallavi

  jhala jhlavenap-pongum sangiTattil en jIvan tangap-paDagu pOlat-tavazhndu magizhndu sellak-


caraNam    mErudaNDa vINai vEda OmkAram pADa vida vidap-padam vaittE hrdaya brahman ADa
pErinba rasangaLai vAri vArip-parugi piravAmal iravAmal maravAmal anbu sheyyum
